    • fillByHoledMatTest

      public static void fillByHoledMatTest​(String imgFileName, String holeFileName, boolean isEightConnected, FillHoleAlgo algo) throws IOException
      First getting the matrix representing the subject image with the hole in it. Next fixing it using the filling algorithm and eventually writing the fixed image to the current working directory
      Parameters:
      imgFileName - The file name of the image
      holeFileName - The file name of the hole
      isEightConnected - Whether or not to use the 8-connected approach (the default is 4-connected)
      algo - The algorithm to use in order to fill the hole
      Throws:
      IOException - In case there's a problem reading an image or writing the result

    • runBoundaryLineSpaceAlgoWithRotation

      public static void runBoundaryLineSpaceAlgoWithRotation​(String imgFileName, String holeFileName) throws IOException
      Fill the hole using the Line Space algorithm but this time use rotation, i.e. for each hole pixel, choose different log(n) pixels from the boundary, each time rotate the head pixel by one from the previous head pixel
      Parameters:
      imgFileName - The file name of the image
      holeFileName - The file name of the hole
      Throws:
      IOException - In case there's a problem reading an image or writing the result

    • runRandHoleAlgo

      public static void runRandHoleAlgo​(String imgFileName, String holeFileName) throws IOException
      Running the HoleRand algorithm with both connected approaches (8 and 4)
      Parameters:
      imgFileName - The file name of the image
      holeFileName - The file name of the hole
      Throws:
      IOException - In case there's a problem reading an image or writing the result

    • runRandBoundaryAlgo

      public static void runRandBoundaryAlgo​(String imgFileName, String holeFileName) throws IOException
      Running the BoundaryRand algorithm with both connected approaches (8 and 4)
      Parameters:
      imgFileName - The file name of the image
      holeFileName - The file name of the hole
      Throws:
      IOException - In case there's a problem reading an image or writing the result

    • runVarious

      Parameters:
